name: SlimeHeart
description:
Having a heart means having something to hurt. In separating yourself from your heart, you might be able to protect yourself… but you can never truly sever your connection with your feelings. Help a lonely slime recover their memories. You must protect your heart from harmful obstacles, but you can’t get far without it, either.

Made in 48hrs for the GMTK2021 - Joined Together
